buginformation.summary: binary operators behaviour involving node sets incorrect
buginformation.description: according xpath specification both objects compared are node sets then the comparison will true and only there node the first node set and node the second node set such that the result performing the comparison the string values the two nodes true one object compared node set and the other number then the comparison will true and only there node the node set such that the result performing the comparison the number compared and the result converting the string value that node number using the number function true but following example illustrates that this not jxpath behaviour jxpathcontext pathcontext jxpathcontext newcontext documentbuilderfactory newinstance newdocumentbuilder parse new inputsource new stringreader xml version encoding utf doc boolean result boolean pathcontext getvalue child boolean class assertfalse result booleanvalue child not found right operand node set empty but result true instead false please check greaterthan lesserthan etc methods org apache xpath objects xobject for possible solution
